summary: This document is an email from Vahe Stepanian to Amanda Kirby discussing a wire transfer issue related to a checking account. Stepanian mentions a conversation with Rich regarding the wire not being posted and provides contact information for Janet and Gina at JPMorgan for further inquiries.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is communicating about a wire transfer issue and provides contact information for others involved.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email and is advised to discuss the wire transfer issue with Vahe Stepanian.

persons.name: Rich
persons.context: Rich is mentioned as having called about the wire transfer issue.

persons.name: Janet
persons.context: Janet is mentioned as someone who has sent wires to the account before and is surprised it hasn't posted.

persons.name: Gina
persons.context: Gina is mentioned as an alternative contact at JPMorgan if Janet is unavailable.

connections.description: Vahe Stepanian is communicating with Amanda Kirby regarding a work-related issue.
Rich is mentioned as having called Vahe about the wire transfer issue.
Both are contacts at JPMorgan mentioned in relation to the wire transfer issue.

locations: 345 Park Avenue - 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Vahe Stepanian is following up on a wire transfer issue related to a checking account.
Rich claims that the wire transfer has not yet been posted to the account.
Janet at JPMorgan has previously sent wires to the account and is surprised by the delay.
Gina is mentioned as a backup contact at JPMorgan if Janet is unavailable due to a storm.
